glosses: somehow; due to an unknown, uncertain reason; for some reason, for whatever reason

examples.translation: She somehow managed to convince him.

glosses: anyway, in any case, either way, however it is

examples.text: Eve şimdi geri dönüp onu almana gerek yok, nasılsa yarın yine buluştuğumuzda getirirsin.
examples.translation: You don't need to go back home now to get it; you can bring it tomorrow when we meet again anyway.

examples.text: Artık acele etmene gerek kalmadı, nasılsa yemeği kaçıracaksın.
examples.translation: There's no need for you to rush anymore, you're going to miss the meal either way.

examples.text: Devletten medet ummak aptallıktır, bugün nasılsa yarın da öyle olacaktır.
examples.translation: It's foolish to pin one's hopes on the state; it will be the same tomorrow as it is today.

etymology: From nasıl (“how, in what manner”) + ise (conditional copula).
